title: Implement User Registration
description: As a customer, I want to register securely so that I can create a new account on the banking portal.
acceptance_criteria: Given the registration form, When I enter valid details, Then my account should be created successfully.

test_cases.Then: my account should be created successfully

title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to set up multi-factor authentication options so that my account access is secured.
acceptance_criteria: Given the multi-factor setup page, When I configure OTP via SMS, Then my account should be secured with multi-factor authentication.

test_cases.Then: my account should be secured with multi-factor authentication

title: Implement Responsive Layout
description: As a customer, I want the banking portal to adapt to different device screens so that my user experience is consistent across devices.
acceptance_criteria: Given any device (desktop, tablet, mobile), When I access the portal, Then the layout should adjust to fit the screen size.

test_cases.Then: the layout should adjust to fit the screen size

title: Ensure Intuitive Navigation
description: As a customer, I want clear navigation so that I can easily find the services I need.
attributes_and_rules: Optimize menu and links for usability
acceptance_criteria: Given the web portal, When I use navigation options, Then I should find services easily without confusion.

test_cases.Then: I should find services easily without confusion

title: Display Personalized Account Information
description: As a customer, I want to see my account details and balance on the dashboard so that I can quickly review my financial status.
attributes_and_rules: Update account information in real time
acceptance_criteria: Given the dashboard, When I log in, Then my account details and balance should be displayed.

test_cases.Then: my account details and balance should be displayed

title: Show Relevant Product Recommendations
description: As a customer, I want to see product recommendations relevant to my profile so that I can explore new offerings easily.
attributes_and_rules: Recommend products based on user profile
acceptance_criteria: Given the dashboard, When I log in, Then I should see product recommendations relevant to my profile.

test_cases.Then: I should see product recommendations relevant to my profile

title: Submit Account Opening Requests
description: As a customer, I want to open a new bank account online so that I can access banking services without visiting a branch.
acceptance_criteria: Given the account opening form, When I fill out and submit the form, Then my request to open a new account should be processed.

test_cases.When: I fill out and submit the form
test_cases.Then: my request to open a new account should be processed

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Request Service Modifications
description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing banking services so that I can update my preferences online.
acceptance_criteria: Given the service modification form, When I submit a request, Then my preferences should be updated accordingly.

test_cases.Then: my preferences should be updated accordingly

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save partially completed applications so that I can finish them later.
attributes_and_rules: Allow resumption from where left off
acceptance_criteria: Given a partially completed application, When I save my progress, Then I should be able to resume later from where I left off.

test_cases.Then: I should be able to resume later from where I left off

title: Track Request Status in Real Time
description: As a customer, I want to view the live status of my application so that I know where my request stands.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure status visibility for all request types
acceptance_criteria: Given an ongoing request, When I check the status, Then I should see a real-time update on its progress.

test_cases.Then: I should see a real-time update on its progress

title: Receive Email Notifications
description: As a customer, I want to get email notifications about updates on my requests so that I stay informed without checking the portal frequently.
attributes_and_rules: Send email alerts for status updates
acceptance_criteria: Given a request update, When the update occurs, Then an email notification should be sent automatically.

test_cases.Then: an email notification should be sent automatically

title: Upload Required Documents
description: As a customer, I want to upload digital copies of my documents so that I can complete account applications online.
acceptance_criteria: Given the document upload page, When I upload my documents, Then they should be stored securely.

title: Verify Uploaded Files
description: As a system, I want to validate uploaded files for correctness and security so that only valid documents are processed.
acceptance_criteria: Given an uploaded document, When the system processes it, Then it should validate and ensure correctness.

test_cases.Then: it should validate and ensure correctness

title: Define Customer and Admin Roles
description: As an admin, I want to define roles and access levels so that users have access only to the services they are authorized for.
attributes_and_rules: Define roles for customers and admins
acceptance_criteria: Given the role management portal, When I define a new role, Then users should have access to specified services according to their role.

test_cases.Then: users should have access to specified services according to their role

title: Restrict Access Based on Role
description: As a system, I want to restrict access based on user roles so that sensitive operations remain protected.
acceptance_criteria: Given a user role, When accessing the portal, Then access to services should be restricted according to the role permissions.

test_cases.Then: access to services should be restricted according to the role permissions

title: Synchronize Data with Core Banking System
description: As a system, I want to sync customer data with the core banking platform so that the information stays consistent across all systems.
acceptance_criteria: Given the integration API, When syncing data, Then customer information should be consistent across the portal and core banking system.

test_cases.Then: customer information should be consistent across the portal and core banking system

title: Handle Integration Errors Gracefully
description: As a system, I want to log and handle integration errors properly so that operations continue smoothly.
acceptance_criteria: Given an integration error, When an error occurs, Then it should be logged, and fallback mechanisms should ensure smooth operations.

test_cases.Then: it should be logged, and fallback mechanisms should ensure smooth operations

title: Secure Data Storage with Encryption
description: As a system, I want to encrypt all sensitive data so that it remains protected from unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: Given sensitive data, When storing the data, Then it should be encrypted to protect against unauthorized access.

test_cases.Then: it should be encrypted to protect against unauthorized access

title: Maintain Audit Trail
description: As a customer, I want to view my past interactions and transactions so that I can track my banking history.
acceptance_criteria: Given the interaction history, When I view the log, Then I should see a comprehensive list of my past interactions and transactions.

test_cases.Then: I should see a comprehensive list of my past interactions and transactions
